# Battle of Carthage State Historic Site

| coords_ref      =
| area_acre       = 7.4
| area_ref        =
| elevation       =

| website         =
| embedded        =
}}
The Battle of Carthage State Historic Site is a state-owned property located in the city of Carthage, Missouri. The  site preserves one of the skirmish sites of the Battle of Carthage which took place in 1861 as one of the first battles of the American Civil War.
}}

*[https://mostateparks.com/park/battle-carthage-state-historic-site Battle of Carthage State Historic Site] Missouri Department of Natural Resources
